heroTitle: Value your time and increse your sell online
heroDescription: Elevate your sales with AI. Descrify will instantly generate a captivating description for your listing. Boost your sales on Vinted, eBay, Subito, and more, with descriptions that sell
featuresDescription: With Descrify, you’re just a few clicks away from the perfect product description. Our AI analyzes your item’s details and crafts descriptions designed to sell. No more writing stress - spend your time where it counts
pricesTitle: Maximize Your Listings, Minimize Your Effort
pricesDescription: Choose a Descrify plan that suits your needs. Our Free plan is great to get started, while our Standard and Premium plans offer advanced features for serious sellers. Sell more, effortlessly
faqsDescription: We’ve got answers. Discover how Descrify can change the way you sell online.
footerCaption: The smarter way to sell. Harness the power of AI for listings that stand out and sell fast.
modalSettingCaption1: Select the language of the platform
